# NWProtocolQUIC.Metadata.KeepAliveBehavior.on

**Case**

Keepalives are enabled with the default timeout.

## Declaration

```swift
case on
```

## Keepalive Behaviors

- **NWProtocolQUIC.Metadata.KeepAliveBehavior.off**: Keepalives are disabled.
- **NWProtocolQUIC.Metadata.KeepAliveBehavior.seconds(_:)**: Keepalives are enabled with a custom timeout, in seconds.
